title: Which tool can suggest long keywords for the main keywords in my article? - Quora

response.answer_text: I categorize 3 types of tools you may need1. Online Tools: Here are some popular online tools: Google Keyword Planner, KWFinder, Ahrefs, Moz, SEMRush, Ubersuggest and so on 2. Chrome Extension like Keywords Everywhere - Keyword Tool, SEO & Website Analysis, Wordtracker Scout 3. WordPress plugins If you run wordpress platforms, you definitely install SEO plugins such as WP Keyword Suggest, Yoast SEO: the #1 WordPress SEO Plugin • Yoast. Recently, I found interested plugin. It is WordPress Longtail Keywords SEO. It suggests you the keywords that related to the main topic and your content with detailed search volume, CPC, competition rate

I think there are many tools that can help you to suggest long keywords for the primary keyword you want to create content. Check directly on website through Google Planner, Google Tool io, Semrush, Ahref, etc,… If your website is made by wordpress, you can download the WordPress Plugin Longtail Keyword SEO so that it can be directly suggested while composing the article, can see more the analysis of the search volume, the competition, the ability to dark Optimize and give the smartest suggestions that fit your content.
